main_definition: A vista refers to a pleasing view, especially one seen through a long, narrow opening or over a distance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A scenic landscape viewed from a particular point
meanings_and_examples.example: The rolling hills in the distance created a breathtaking vista.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity or prospect for something, such as business success
meanings_and_examples.example: We see a great vista for expanding our company into new markets.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A way of looking at things or interpreting events or situations
meanings_and_examples.example: His political views are different from mine, so we have opposing visions for the future of the country.
